page.title: 16A SCHOOL CRICKET MATCH
page.content: The Skinner's School playing fields are at Southfields Park (5841). Most of our junior matches are played on Saturday mornings. There are three main cricket pitches: the senior square; the junior wicket; the artificial wicket. We arrive at about 9.30 a.m. for the game. All the boys wait for the masters to arrive. When they come we all get changed in the pavilion. Soon the opposition arrive and they change too. We carry the cricket gear to the edge of the pitch. The game begins with the two captains tossing a coin to decide which team shall have first innings. The match usually finishes at about 1 p.m. and we make our way back to the pavilion. There we have buns and tea, after which we all go home.
